synopsis.text:
Whether it's whipping up delicious pastries or navigating the complexities of adolescence, the magical girls of "Ojamajo Doremi Na-i-sho" have their hands full in this 13-episode OVA series. Set during the summer between the third and fourth seasons of "Ojamajo Doremi," the girls find themselves running a bakery and grappling with the challenges of growing up.

From entering a swimming competition to creating the perfect taiyaki, each episode centers on a different character's personal journey or "secret." And with Hana transformed back into a baby, the girls have an extra dose of chaos to contend with.

But it's not all fun and games - the series also delves into the romantic lives of the five witches, adding a new layer of depth to their relationships. With its more mature themes and focus on character development, "Ojamajo Doremi Na-i-sho" offers a fresh take on the beloved anime series. So join Doremi, Hazuki, Aiko, Onpu, and Momoko as they embark on a summer of self-discovery, adventure, and of course, a little bit of magic.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
